title: [Question] 5th sem seniors, how was the grading for yall in your 3rd sem? Were they relatively graded or were they not??
content: 5th sem seniors, how was the grading for yall in your 3rd sem? Were they relatively graded or were they not??

comments.body: I had the same question, but I graduated before I could figure it out.
Pretty inflated in 3rd sem n 5th sem for us

I expected B in a subject end up getting S n some expected bad cg but everyone got good
But it's  not the case always it depends on how your batch performs in that subject so don't keep hopes .If you get it's good
